name: GDPR Easycloud
author: Emiliano Maddalena

sections.description:
GDPR Easycloud is the plugin that allows you to easily manage cookies in compliance with the general data protection regulations (GDPR).

Features

  • GDPR control
  • Text and style customizable
  • Shortcode to include link to edit cookie
  • Easy to use

Translations

  • Italian
sections.installation:
• Download and install the GDPR Easycloud from the plugin page of your site or load the plugin folder in the \’/wp-content/plugins/\’ directory.
  • Activate the plugin.
  • Now you are ready to use the plugin.
  • You can customize text and style in the setting plugin page.
sections.changelog:
1.0.6 – 2019-02-12

  • Improved design

1.0.5 – 2018-09-07

  • Bugs fixed

1.0.4 – 2018-07-19

  • Fixed loading of the GDPR JavaScript library
  • Fixed other bugs

1.0.3 – 2018-07-19

  • Replace tag h1 with h4
  • Replace tag h2 with h5

1.0.2 – 2018-07-09

  • Load javascript library with get_footer action
  • Exclude custom style if empty

1.0.1 – 2018-07-03

  • Moving the GDPR library to the footer

1.0 – 2018-06-29

  • First release
